function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reduction in public social expenditures","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rising inequality and falling labor shares of income","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of vulnerabilities caused by neoliberalism","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal impact of covid-19 on different social classes, genders, and age groups","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technologies for epidemic monitoring and control","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-speed network reliance for tracking strategic locations and infected patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry 4.0 and medicine 4.0 adoption","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for innovative and emerging technologies to combat the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot for operational continuity during pandemics or emergencies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote collaboration and control in industrial iot may lead to greater spread of contagious diseases if not managed effectively.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of digital maintenance and automation in response to pandemics may result in operational disruptions and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness in identifying and mitigating potential equipment failures through digital twin technology may lead to increased risk of disease transmission and productivity losses.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in travel patterns and behaviors due to covid-19 may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases in transportation networks.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of seamless integration of data from different sources may result in inaccurate or unreliable information being shared with travelers.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency and delays in logistics could lead to hoarding of supplies, social contact, and increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases during supply chain operations.","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data integration and data security could lead to compromised access control, potentially risking sensitive information.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on online services may lead to a reduced physical presence in brick-and-mortar stores, potentially impacting public health and safety.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration and analysis of customer behavior data may limit the effectiveness of ai, iot, and big data solutions in the retail and entertainment industry.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective indoor navigation leading to increased contact with other people","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning due to lack of understanding of indoor mobility data","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient integration of data leading to ineffective deployment of context-aware devices","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart buildings and robots must grasp spatial indoor topology, semantics, and dynamic information to serve people effectively","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security and privacy concerns in the context of pandemic regulations","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of iot in industrial settings may lead to higher risk of disease transmission due to increased interaction with shared equipment and spaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Additive manufacturing to meet increased demand for medical supplies may lead to potential contamination and safety risks in the production process.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases may disrupt manufacturing operations due to absenteeism, reduced operational hours, and limited on-site staff.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with sops by uber drivers due to unreliable facial mask detection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in public transport usage and closure of ports leading to increase in freight charges","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions caused by humans strikes, cyber attacks, terrorism","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile application for contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearable technology for contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance of covid-19 patients through dynamic dashboards","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate visitor management leading to potential spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing data from public transport and shopping malls may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if the data is not managed properly.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lax adherence to safety protocols leading to surge in covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective data integration and sharing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective contact tracing systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearable devices and self-reported symptoms for covid-19 detection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of handheld and portable ultrasound solutions for covid-19 patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of covid-19 identification systems into wearables may lead to a false sense of security and reduced adherence to other preventive measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based diagnosis for contagious diseases may lead to algorithmic biases and inaccurate identification","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for wearables due to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of iot adoption in healthcare sector due to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of wearable devices for tracking and contact tracing during covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to extensive interviewing and interaction with people from various companies and organizations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 during extensive literature review and database searching","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote work and telehealth leads to higher risk of contagious disease propagation through increased interaction in the built environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on technology for essential social interactions may lead to decreased in-person social connections, which can impact mental health and well-being.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of user cooperation in contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
